books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The anchor of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: A look at some of the places — Greece, Ireland, Iceland — hardest hit by the financial collapse of 2008, and at how it happened.
books.name: BOOMERANG

books.author: by Ellen DeGeneres
books.description: A collection of humor pieces from the stand-up comedian and talk-show host.
books.name: SERIOUSLY... I'M KIDDING

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Herman Cain
books.description: The life and views of the Republican presidential candidate and former C.E.O. of Godfather’s Pizza.
books.name: THIS IS HERMAN CAIN!

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: How Billy Beane, the general manager of the Oakland Athletics, has produced successful teams despite having one of the smallest payrolls in baseball.
books.name: MONEYBALL

books.description: Recordings and transcripts of a seven-part interview with Arthur M. Schlesinger Jr. in 1964.
books.name: Jacqueline Kennedy: Historic Conversations On Life With John F. Kennedy

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were extensively cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS

books.author: by Thomas L. Friedman and Michael Mandelbaum
books.description: How America fell behind in the world it invented, and how it can come back.
books.name: THAT USED TO BE US

books.author: by Jaycee Dugard
books.description: A woman tells of being kidnapped at the age of 11 and held prisoner for 18 years by a convicted rapist and his wife.
books.name: A STOLEN LIFE

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: This portrait of Berlin during the rise of the Nazis centers on the family of William E. Dodd, the U.S. ambassador there.
books.name: IN THE GARDEN OF BEASTS

books.author: by Ron Suskind
books.description: President Obama and his advisers, often at odds with one another, respond to the economic crisis.
books.name: CONFIDENCE MEN

books.author: by Candice Millard
books.description: The life and death by assassination (and medical malpractice) of President James A. Garfield.
books.name: DESTINY OF THE REPUBLIC

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the former "Saturday Night Live" star and creator of "30 Rock."
books.name: BOSSYPANTS
